original_title: Volbeat: Live at Wacken Open Air 2012
overview: Volbeat Live in Wacken 2012  Another Day, Another Way  Sad Man's Tongue  A Moment Forever / Hallelujah Goat  Who They Are  Fallen  7 Shots  (with Mille Petrozza from Kreator on vocals)  Heaven nor Hell  16 Dollars  Radio Girl  Evelyn  (with Barney from Napalm Death on vocals)  A Warrior's Call  Pool of Booze, Booze, Booza  Still Counting
title: Volbeat: Live at Wacken Open Air 2012
